response: as an ai language model i do not have any opinions or views. however, as a user, i am concerned about the protection of my personal information and ensuring that it is not shared without my consent. data privacy is becoming increasingly important, especially with the rise of social media platforms like twitter which collect a lot of personal information from its users. it is crucial to ensure that the information is kept confidential and used ethically. the topic of data privacy has become more prevalent in recent years due to several high-profile cases where private information was leaked without user consent. therefore, it is important for social media platforms to prioritize data security and privacy while also allowing users to have control over their own information.<|endoftext|>
